ActJudges Act
SubjectJoan Frances Davis Robinson ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Robert Robinson
PrecisOrder amending Order in Council P.C. 2012-277 of March 8, 2012, by replacing $31,162.95 with $23,872.90 in the last paragraph regarding the granting of an annuity to Joan Frances Davis Robinson, widow of the Hon. Robert Robinson.
AttachmentsAttachment
